languages.text: {n}Цепляясь за пылающие остатки своего гаснущего сознания, вы повторяете за Паскалем слова литании и касаетесь командных рун, пока молния, рвущая ваши мышцы и заставляющая кости трещать, не угасает.{/n}

{n}Clinging on to the blazing shreds of your fading consciousness, you repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal and touch the command runes, as the unabating lightning rips through your muscles and makes your bones crackle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Цепляясь за пылающие остатки своего гаснущего сознания, вы повторяете за Паскалем слова литании и касаетесь командных рун, пока молния, рвущая ваши мышцы и заставляющая кости трещать, не угасает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du klammerst dich an die brennenden Fetzen deines schwindenden Bewusstseins und sprichst Pasqal die Litanei nach. Du berührst die Befehlsrunen, während unaufhörlich Blitze durch deine Muskeln zucken und deine Knochen knistern lassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clinging on to the blazing shreds of your fading consciousness, you repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal and touch the command runes, as the unabating lightning rips through your muscles and makes your bones crackle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du klammerst dich an die brennenden Fetzen deines schwindenden Bewusstseins und sprichst Pasqal die Litanei nach. Du berührst die Befehlsrunen, während unaufhörlich Blitze durch deine Muskeln zucken und deine Knochen knistern lassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous raccrochant à ce qui vous reste de conscience, vous répétez les paroles de la litanie après Pasqal et touchez les runes de contrôle, tandis qu'un éclair ininterrompu vous déchire les muscles et fait craquer vos os.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clinging on to the blazing shreds of your fading consciousness, you repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal and touch the command runes, as the unabating lightning rips through your muscles and makes your bones crackle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous raccrochant à ce qui vous reste de conscience, vous répétez les paroles de la litanie après Pasqal et touchez les runes de contrôle, tandis qu'un éclair ininterrompu vous déchire les muscles et fait craquer vos os.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你紧紧抓住逐渐消逝的意识碎片，跟随帕斯卡诵念祷文，触碰指挥符文。无情的电流在你的肌肉中流过，你的骨头噼啪作响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clinging on to the blazing shreds of your fading consciousness, you repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal and touch the command runes, as the unabating lightning rips through your muscles and makes your bones crackle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你紧紧抓住逐渐消逝的意识碎片，跟随帕斯卡诵念祷文，触碰指挥符文。无情的电流在你的肌肉中流过，你的骨头噼啪作响。{/n}

languages.text: {n}消えゆく意識のジリジリとした尻尾にしがみつきながら、パスカルの後について連祷の言葉を繰り返し、コマンドルーンに触れると、弱まることのない稲妻が筋肉を直撃して、骨はパチパチと音を立てた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clinging on to the blazing shreds of your fading consciousness, you repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal and touch the command runes, as the unabating lightning rips through your muscles and makes your bones crackle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}消えゆく意識のジリジリとした尻尾にしがみつきながら、パスカルの後について連祷の言葉を繰り返し、コマンドルーンに触れると、弱まることのない稲妻が筋肉を直撃して、骨はパチパチと音を立てた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aferrándote a los fragmentos ardientes de tu débil conciencia, repites las palabras de la letanía después de Pasqal y tocas las runas de mando, mientras el relámpago incesante desgarra tus músculos y hace crujir tus huesos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clinging on to the blazing shreds of your fading consciousness, you repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal and touch the command runes, as the unabating lightning rips through your muscles and makes your bones crackle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aferrándote a los fragmentos ardientes de tu débil conciencia, repites las palabras de la letanía después de Pasqal y tocas las runas de mando, mientras el relámpago incesante desgarra tus músculos y hace crujir tus huesos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yitti yitecek olan bilincinin alevlenen kırıntılarına tutunmaya çabalarken Pasqal'ın peşinden ilahiyi tekrarlıyorsun. Dur durak bilmeyen şimşekler kaslarını yararak geçip kemiklerinde çatırdarken komuta rünlerine dokunuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clinging on to the blazing shreds of your fading consciousness, you repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal and touch the command runes, as the unabating lightning rips through your muscles and makes your bones crackle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yitirmek üzere olduğun bilincine tutunmaya çalışırken Pasqal'ın peşinden ilahiyi tekrarlıyorsun. Mütemadi şimşekler etini lime lime edip kemiklerini parçalarken komuta rünlerine dokunuyorsun.{/n}
